text: Mariangela Melato (September 19, 1941 - January 11, 2013) was an Italian actress who was known for her roles in Swept Away, The Seduction of Mimi, Love and Anarchy, The Working Class Goes to Heaven, and in Policewomen. Melato was born on September 19, 1941 in Milan, Italy. She never married. Melato died on January 11, 2013 from pancreatic cancer in Rome, Italy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mariangela Melato official website * * * Allmovie biography Category:1941 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Milan Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors
title: Mariangela Melato
